title: Implement fsync for rclone mount
body:
Hello,

I was hoping to use Borgbackup as a encryption / dedupe / compression layer on top of an rclone mount to ACD. 

I ran in to an error right away. Given the power and awesomeness that is borgbackup, this could be an awesome use case.

> What is your rclone version (eg output from `rclone -V`)
rclone v1.35

> Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)
Ubuntu 16.04 (container)

> Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)
ACD

> The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
```
rclone mount ACD:Vault_Backups /mnt/ACD-Vault_Backup/ --dir-cache-time 60s -v --debug-fuse --log-file /mnt/rclone.log &
borgbackup init /mnt/ACD-Vault_Backup/
```

> A log from the command with the `-v` flag (eg output from `rclone -v copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
```
root@ws-term:/mnt# fusermount -u ACD-Vault_Backup/
[1]+  Done                    rclone mount ACD:Vault_Backups /mnt/ACD-Vault_Backup/ --dir-cache-time 60s
root@ws-term:/mnt# rclone mount ACD:Vault_Backups /mnt/ACD-Vault_Backup/ --dir-cache-time 60s -v --debug-fuse --log-file /mnt/rclone.log &
[1] 3652
root@ws-term:/mnt# borgbackup init /mnt/ACD-Vault_Backup/
Enter new passphrase:
Enter same passphrase again:
Do you want your passphrase to be displayed for verification? [yN]: n
Exception ignored in: <bound method Repository.__del__ of <Repository /mnt/ACD-Vault_Backup>>
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/repository.py", line 72, in __del__
    self.close()
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/repository.py", line 192, in close
    self.lock.release()
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/locking.py", line 298, in release
    self._roster.modify(EXCLUSIVE, REMOVE)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/locking.py", line 216, in modify
    elements.remove(self.id)
KeyError: (('ws-term', 3661, 0),)
Local Exception.
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/archiver.py", line 85, in wrapper
    return method(self, args, repository=repository, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/archiver.py", line 131, in do_init
    manifest.write()
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/helpers.py", line 139, in write
    self.repository.put(self.MANIFEST_ID, self.key.encrypt(data))
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/repository.py", line 535, in put
    segment, offset = self.io.write_put(id, data)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/repository.py", line 784, in write_put
    fd = self.get_write_fd(raise_full=raise_full)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/repository.py", line 668, in get_write_fd
    sync_dir(os.path.join(self.path, 'data'))
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/platform.py", line 10, in sync_dir
    os.fsync(fd)
OSError: [Errno 5] Input/output error

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/archiver.py", line 1684, in main
    exit_code = archiver.run(args)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/archiver.py", line 1621, in run
    return args.func(args)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/archiver.py", line 85, in wrapper
    return method(self, args, repository=repository, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/repository.py", line 94, in __exit__
    self.close()
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/repository.py", line 192, in close
    self.lock.release()
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/locking.py", line 301, in release
    self._lock.release()
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/borg/locking.py", line 154, in release
    os.unlink(self.unique_name)
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/mnt/ACD-Vault_Backup/lock.exclusive/ws-term.3661-0'

Platform: Linux ws-term 4.4.36-k8s #1 SMP Mon Dec 5 00:55:01 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64
Linux: Ubuntu 16.04 xenial
Borg: 1.0.7  Python: CPython 3.5.2
PID: 3661  CWD: /mnt
sys.argv: ['/usr/bin/borgbackup', 'init', '/mnt/ACD-Vault_Backup/']
SSH_ORIGINAL_COMMAND: None
```
